name: Prehistoric Blocks
description:
PREHISTORIC BLOCKS CRASH GAME. BEAT THE HIGH SCORE!

Let us introduce a new game created for all those who are:
• waiting in a line for some rolls at a supermarket;
• currently using a public transport,
• having a phone call which they don't enjoy at all.

It is a game for all folks who have two spare hands at the moment. Even just for a minute.

MANY PEOPLE ARE INTO PREHISTORIC BLOCKS. YOU WILL NOT WANT TO STOP PLAYING!
But calm down. You can do it though. Just take your fingers off the screen of your smartphone. And then what happens? Pause! You have a break from playing. Just come back whenever you want. It's great, isn't it?

WHAT IS PREHISTORIC BLOCKS ALL ABOUT?

You have a bullet that crashes blocks before they approach the bottom of the screen. If they do so, you lose. You shoot the bullet at one block or you just let it bounce off walls and other blocks. Thanks to this clever trick you gain more points.
What's more you have some extra elements that makes your game easier. It includes bonuses and better bullets. To get them you need to collect stars while shooting.

Let's play and get the highest score!

Check our websites!
www.prehistoricblocks.com
